name: LUCENTIS
treatmentDescriptions: Treatment of patients with neovascular (wet) age-related macular degeneration (AMD). Treatment of adult patients with visual impairment due to diabetic macular oedema (DME) . The treatment of visual impairement due to macular oedema secondary to retinal vein occlusion (RVO). The treatment of visual impaiment due to choroidal neovascularization (CNV) . Lucentis is indicated in preterm infants for: the treatment of retinopathy of prematurity (ROP) with zone I (stage 1+, 2+, 3 or 3+), zone II (stage 3+) or AP-ROP (aggressive posterior ROP) disease.The treatment of proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR)
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
